==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=きのう}}
{{IPAchar|/ki no pu/}} → {{IPAchar|/kinoɸu/}} → *{{IPAchar|/kinowu/}} → {{IPAchar|/kinou/}} → {{IPAchar|/kinoː/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=きのう}}. The initial ''ki'' is unclear, but is likely the same ''ki'' element that appears in other words pertaining to the past. This may be related to the now-obsolete auxiliary verb {{ja-r|き}} indicating the [[recollective]] past -- see {{ja-r|けり}}. The middle ''no'' appears to be the regular genitive particle {{ja-r|の}}. The final ''pu'' is an apophonic form of {{m|ja|日|tr=hi||day}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

The kanji are an example of [[熟字訓|jukujikun]].

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|きのう|y=i|acc=2|acc_note=''as a noun''|acc_ref=NHK,DJR,SMK5|acc2=h|acc2_note=''as an adverb''|acc2_ref=NHK,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|きのう|hhira=きのふ}}

# [[yesterday]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''昨日'''、東京は曇りでしたか。|'''^きのう'''、 ^とうきょう は くもり でした か。|Was it cloudy in Tokyo '''yesterday'''?}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|さく|じつ}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=きのう}} compound {{m|zh|昨日|tr=dzak nyit|lit=yesterday + day }}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''zok<sup>6</sup> jat<sup>6</sup>''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|y=ko|さくじつ|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK,DJR,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|さくじつ}}

# [[yesterday]]

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=きそ}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=きそ}}. The initial ''ki'' is unclear, but is likely the same ''ki'' element that appears in other words pertaining to the past. This may be related to the now-obsolete auxiliary verb {{ja-r|き}} indicating the [[recollective]] past -- see {{ja-r|けり}}. The final ''so'' is also unclear, but is probably the same as the final ''zo'' in {{ja-r|去年|こぞ}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

This may have been read as ''kizo'' in {{etyl|ojp|-}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|y=i|きそ}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|きそ}}

# [[last night]]
# [[yesterday]]

=====Coordinate terms=====
{{der-top|Coordinate terms}}
* {{ja-r|一昨々日|さきおととい}}: three days ago
* {{ja-r|一昨日|おととい}}: the [[day before yesterday]], two days ago
* {{ja-r|今日|きょう}}: [[today]]
* {{ja-r|明日|あした}}: [[tomorrow]]
* {{ja-r|明後日|あさって}}: the [[day after tomorrow]], two days from now
* {{ja-r|明々後日|しあさって}}: three days from now
* {{ja-r|弥の明後日|やのあさって}}: three days from now; {{qualifier|dialectal}} four days from now
* {{ja-r|今朝|けさ}}: this morning
* {{ja-r|今晩|こんばん}}: this evening
* {{ja-r|今夜|こんや}}: tonight
